tool.name: Blast2Gff
tool.help:
Blast2Gff.pl AUTHOR: James C. Estill CONTACT: JamesEstill_at_gmail.com STARTED: 04/17/2007 UPDATED: 04/18/2007 DESCRIPTION: Converts BLAST output to GFF format. This the the GFF format that is used with the Apollo Genome Annotation curation program. Currently this only works with m8 blast output.
